Cat on a hot tin roof. Orpheus descending. Suddenly last summer -- v. 4. Sweet bird of youth. Period of adjustment. The night of the Iguana -- v. 5. The milk train doesn't stop here anymore. Kingdom of Earth (The seven descents of Myrtle). Small craft warnings. The two-character play -- v. 6. 27 wagons full of cotton and other short plays -- v. 7. In the bar of a Tokyo hotel and other plays -- v. 8. Vieux Carre. A lovely Sunday for Creve Coeur. Clothes for a summer hotel. The red devil battery sign.
